<a id="SkeletonModifier3D"></a>

# SkeletonModifier3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [BoneConstraint3D](BoneConstraint3D.md), [LookAtModifier3D](LookAtModifier3D.md), [ModifierBoneTarget3D](ModifierBoneTarget3D.md), [PhysicalBoneSimulator3D](PhysicalBoneSimulator3D.md), [RetargetModifier3D](RetargetModifier3D.md), [SkeletonIK3D](SkeletonIK3D.md), [SpringBoneSimulator3D](SpringBoneSimulator3D.md), [XRBodyModifier3D](XRBodyModifier3D.md), [XRHandModifier3D](XRHandModifier3D.md)

A node that may modify a Skeleton3D's bones.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**SkeletonModifier3D** retrieves a target [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) by having a [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) parent.

If there is an [AnimationMixer](AnimationMixer.md), a modification always performs after playback process of the [AnimationMixer](AnimationMixer.md).

This node should be used to implement custom IK solvers, constraints, or skeleton physics.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Design of the Skeleton Modifier 3D](https://godotengine.org/article/design-of-the-skeleton-modifier-3d/)

## Signals

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_signal_modification_processed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**modification_processed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_signal_modification_processed)

Notifies when the modification have been finished.

\ **Note:** If you want to get the modified bone pose by the modifier, you must use [Skeleton3D.get_bone_pose()](Skeleton3D.md#Skeleton3D_method_get_bone_pose) or [Skeleton3D.get_bone_global_pose()](Skeleton3D.md#Skeleton3D_method_get_bone_global_pose) at the moment this signal is fired.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_property_active"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **active** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_property_active)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_active**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_active**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **SkeletonModifier3D** will be processing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_property_influence"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **influence** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_property_influence)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_influence**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_influence**\ (\ )

Sets the influence of the modification.

\ **Note:** This value is used by [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) to blend, so the **SkeletonModifier3D** should always apply only 100% of the result without interpolation.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_process_modification**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification)

**Deprecated:** Use [_process_modification_with_delta()](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification_with_delta) instead.

Override this virtual method to implement a custom skeleton modifier. You should do things like get the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md)'s current pose and apply the pose here.

\ [_process_modification()](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification) must not apply [influence](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_property_influence) to bone poses because the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) automatically applies influence to all bone poses set by the modifier.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification_with_delta"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_process_modification_with_delta**\ (\ delta\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification_with_delta)

Override this virtual method to implement a custom skeleton modifier. You should do things like get the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md)'s current pose and apply the pose here.

\ [_process_modification_with_delta()](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__process_modification_with_delta) must not apply [influence](SkeletonModifier3D.md#SkeletonModifier3D_property_influence) to bone poses because the [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md) automatically applies influence to all bone poses set by the modifier.

\ `delta` is passed from parent [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md). See also [Skeleton3D.advance()](Skeleton3D.md#Skeleton3D_method_advance).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__skeleton_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_skeleton_changed**\ (\ old_skeleton\: [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md), new_skeleton\: [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__skeleton_changed)

Called when the skeleton is changed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__validate_bone_names"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_validate_bone_names**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModifier3D_private_method__validate_bone_names)

Called when bone name and index need to be validated such as the timing of the entering tree or changing skeleton.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>
